cards.title: 2-Week Intensive
cards.description: A comprehensive program designed for non-technical individuals looking to build real products rapidly.

cards.title: Our Philosophy
cards.description: Learning by doing, PM-first approach, and AI-augmented creation to overcome technical barriers.

cards.title: Outcomes
cards.description: Graduate with a functional product, portfolio piece, and the ability to build without coding.

cards.title: Expectations
cards.description: All you need is curiosity, a laptop, and an internet connection to create magic. No prior technical experience required.

days.assignment: Identify a problem and select appropriate no-code tools to address it
Create user personas and journey maps with corresponding UI mockups
Build a landing page that clearly communicates core value proposition
Design database schema and define metrics
Create automated workflows that optimize key user journeys
Design pricing tiers with strategy documentation
Present MVP with documented validation plan and early metrics
Plan AI feature implementation with business justification
Create competitive landscape analysis and differentiation strategy
Document technical requirements and create decision log with rationale
Design and implement AI feature with documented prompt strategy
Create QA test plan with error scenarios and performance metrics
Build a product roadmap with prioritized features and resource requirements
Present final product with GTM strategy and growth projections
